languages.text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one round.
languages.original_text: Цель и все существа в радиусе 4 клеток от нее получают {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>пси-рейтинг</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и проходят проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цели оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 раунд.

traits.locale_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer <u>psy rating</u> damage and must pass an Agility resistance test or fall prone for one round.

languages.text: 目标与4格内所有生物都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>灵能等级</u>{/g}。所有受影响的角色需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，未能通过检定的角色会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 目标与4格内所有生物都会受到伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>灵能等级</u>{/g}。所有受影响的角色需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的角色会进入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: El objetivo y todos los que se encuentren en un radio de 4 casillas de él sufren {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>factor psíquico</u>{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de resistencia{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo y todos los que se encuentren en un radio de 4 casillas de él sufren {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>factor psíquico</u>{/g} de daño y deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットと4セル以内の全員が{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>超能力レート</u>{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受ける。テストに失敗した場合は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットと4セル以内の全員が{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>超能力レート</u>{/g}ダメージを受け、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}を受ける。テストに失敗した場合は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

languages.text: Цель и все существа в радиусе 4 клеток от нее получают {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>пси-рейтинг</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и проходят проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цели оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one round.

traits.locale_text: Цель и все существа в радиусе 4 клеток от нее получают <u>пси-рейтинг</u> урона и проходят проверку Ловкости на сопротивление. В случае провала цели оказываются опрокинуты на 1 раунд.
Цель и все существа в радиусе 4 клеток от нее получают <u>пси-рейтинг</u> урона и проходят проверку Ловкости на сопротивление. В случае провала цели оказываются опрокинуты на 1 раунд.

languages.text: Das Ziel und alle innerhalb eines 4-Felder-Radius erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>Psi-Wert</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} ausführen. Scheitert diese, wird der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel und alle innerhalb eines 4-Felder-Radius erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>Psi-Wert</u>{/g} Schaden und müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} ausführen. Scheitert diese, wird der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: La cible et tous les personnages présents dans un rayon de 4 cases autour d'elle subissent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>indice psy</u>{/g} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, faute de quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisés{/g} pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target and everyone a 4-cell radius suffer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible et tous les personnages présents dans un rayon de 4 cases autour d'elle subissent {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>indice psy</u>{/g} points de dégâts et doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, faute de quoi ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}immobilisés{/g} pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
